title: Cheddar, Bacon and Asparagus Strata
ingredients: ['450g bacon', '450g fresh asparagus, trimmed', '8 eggs', '475ml milk', '1/4 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon pepper', '1 (500g) loaf sliced bread, crusts removed', '120g grated Cheddar cheese', '4 tablespoons chopped onion', '1/2 red pepper, diced', '120g grated Cheddar cheese']
